text: The flag of San Luis Potosí () has two horizontal stripes of yellow and blue with the coat of arms of San Luis Potosí. It was adopted 4 May 2024. ==Design and symbolism== Name Color HEX Code Yellow #F1BF00 Bright Blue #0096FF ==References== San Luis Potosí City Category:Flags with coats of arms
title: Flag of San Luis Potosí City
